CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 14, 1959, pg. 5, reads: "Purchase Benefit Tickets - Members of the Fifth Avenue Junior High School basketball team will be on hand for the March 24 basketball game at the Pitt Fieldhouse for the benefit of Maurice Stokes. Their attendance was assured this week when the Business and Professional Association purchased tickets for them.  'Mal' Goode, a member of the group, is shown handing the tickets to President Leonard Brown of Brown's Superettes.  Others in picture are, left to right: Albert Charles, mortician; William Goodman, Goodman's Grocery Store; James Givner, manager, Pittsburgh office of Craftsman Insurance Company, and Luther Johnson, photographer of Johnson Studios. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Albert Charles, Mal Goode holding tickets, William Goodman, Leonard Brown, James Givner, and Luther Johnson
